apProbeRttExtMib.name: apProbeRttExtMib
apProbeRttExtMib.contactinfo: Customer Support Postal: ArrowPoint Communications, Inc. 50 Nagog Park Acton, Massachusetts 01720 Tel: +1 978 206 3000 E-Mail: mibsupport@arrowpoint.com
apProbeRttExtMib.description: The MIB module used to describe the ArrowPoint Communications Tiered Proximity Service RTT Probe Module functionality.

apProbeRttEnable.name: apProbeRttEnable
apProbeRttEnable.description: This object specifies the state of the Proximity RTT Probe Module. When 'enable' the RTT PM is running on this system. When 'disable' it is not. This object is valid only if apProximityEnable is 'enable'

apProbeRttMethod0.name: apProbeRttMethod0
apProbeRttMethod0.description: This object specifies which probe method is to be tried first. This object is valid only if apProbeRttEnable is 'enable'

apProbeRttMethod1.name: apProbeRttMethod1
apProbeRttMethod1.description: This object specifies which probe method is to be tried second. This object is valid only if apProbeRttEnable is 'enable'

apProbeRttIcmpSamples.name: apProbeRttIcmpSamples
apProbeRttIcmpSamples.description: This object specifies the number of ICMP probe requests to be used to calculate the RTT mean. This object is valid only if apProbeRttEnable is 'enable'

apProbeRttIcmpInterval.name: apProbeRttIcmpInterval
apProbeRttIcmpInterval.description: This object specifies the time delay in seconds between consecutive ICMP requests to an individual client. This object is valid only if apProbeRttEnable is 'enable'

apProbeRttTcpPort0.name: apProbeRttTcpPort0
apProbeRttTcpPort0.description: The first TCP port number to be probed on the client's local name server.

apProbeRttTcpPort1.name: apProbeRttTcpPort1
apProbeRttTcpPort1.description: The second TCP port number to be probed on the client's local name server. Used only if the first port fails.

apProbeRttTcpPort2.name: apProbeRttTcpPort2
apProbeRttTcpPort2.description: The third TCP port number to be probed on the client's local name server. Used only if the first and second ports fail.

apProbeRttTcpPort3.name: apProbeRttTcpPort3
apProbeRttTcpPort3.description: The fourth TCP port number to be probed on the client's local name server. Used only if the first, second and third ports fail.

apProbeRttLastReset.name: apProbeRttLastReset
apProbeRttLastReset.description: Elapsed time since the Proximity RTT Probe statistics were reset.

apProbeRttTtlProbes.name: apProbeRttTtlProbes
apProbeRttTtlProbes.description: The total number of times that the PDB has probed a client to measure the RTT. This may be more than the total number of unique clients, and may be less than the actual number of ICMP or TCP requests.

apProbeRttAvgProbes.name: apProbeRttAvgProbes
apProbeRttAvgProbes.description: The cumulative average number of probes per minute since last reset.

apProbeRttICMPReqSent.name: apProbeRttICMPReqSent
apProbeRttICMPReqSent.description: The total number of ICMP requests that have been successfully sent from the PDB in order to measure RTT.

apProbeRttICMPResp.name: apProbeRttICMPResp
apProbeRttICMPResp.description: The total number of valid ICMP responses that the PDB has received. Valid ICMP responses are used to measure RTT.

apProbeRttICMPNoResp.name: apProbeRttICMPNoResp
apProbeRttICMPNoResp.description: The total number of ICMP requests that were successfully sent that did not receive a reply. The ICMP requests that do not recieve a response are not used to measure RTT.

apProbeRttICMPAvgReq.name: apProbeRttICMPAvgReq
apProbeRttICMPAvgReq.description: The cumulative average number of ICMP requests per minute that were successfully sent during the time period since last reset.

apProbeRttICMPSendFail.name: apProbeRttICMPSendFail
apProbeRttICMPSendFail.description: The total number of ICMP requests that the PDB tried to send, but that failed internally, due to a missing route or other problem.

apProbeRttTCPReqSent.name: apProbeRttTCPReqSent
apProbeRttTCPReqSent.description: The total number of TCP requests that have been successfully sent from the PDB in order to measure RTT.

apProbeRttTCPResp.name: apProbeRttTCPResp
apProbeRttTCPResp.description: The total number of valid TCP responses that the PDB has recieved. Valid TCP responses are used to measure RTT.

apProbeRttTCPNoResp.name: apProbeRttTCPNoResp
apProbeRttTCPNoResp.description: The total number of TCP request that were successfully sent that did not recieve a usable response. The RCP requests that do not receive a response are not used to measure RTT.

apProbeRttTCPAvgReq.name: apProbeRttTCPAvgReq
apProbeRttTCPAvgReq.description: The cumulative average number of TCP requests per minute that were successfully sent during the time period since the last reset.

apProbeRttTCPSendFail.name: apProbeRttTCPSendFail
apProbeRttTCPSendFail.description: The total number of TCP requests that the PDB tried to send, but that failed internally, due to a missing route or other problem.

apProbeRttPortTable.name: apProbeRttPortTable
apProbeRttPortTable.description: Statistics table for the TCP ports that are used for probing clients.

apProbeRttPortEntry.name: apProbeRttPortEntry
apProbeRttPortEntry.description: Statistics table entries for TCP ports used for probing clients.

apProbeRttPortIndex.name: apProbeRttPortIndex
apProbeRttPortIndex.description: The index for port information. Not the actual port number

apProbeRttPortNumber.name: apProbeRttPortNumber
apProbeRttPortNumber.description: The TCP port number used for probing the client's name server.

apProbeRttPortRequests.name: apProbeRttPortRequests
apProbeRttPortRequests.description: Total number of successful TCP requests to this port on the client's name server.

apProbeRttPortResponses.name: apProbeRttPortResponses
apProbeRttPortResponses.description: Total number of respones to TCP requests that were sent to this port on the client's local name server.

apProbeRttPortFailures.name: apProbeRttPortFailures
apProbeRttPortFailures.description: Total number of failed TCP requests that were destined for this port on the client's local name server.
